response.original_title: 学生時代のセクハラ教師とデリヘルで偶然の再会―。その日から言いなり性処理ペットにさせられて…。 森沢かな - 森沢かな（飯岡かなこ）
response.overview: A few months after getting married, my happy life with my husband changed completely one day. My husband went bankrupt and couldn't work... I decided to work at a night store apart from my day job to pay the remaining loan. And on that day, I was called by a new customer and headed to my house, but I recognized the face of the first customer. That person was Imai, a sexual harassment teacher when he was a student. Imai didn't notice me, and I tried to play quickly without worrying about it, but it was Imai's trap. Free points for the first 1,000 yen!
response.title: A chance reunion with a sexually harassing teacher from my school days at a delivery health service. From that day on, I was made to be his obedient sex pet...

titles.title: JUQ-090 (中文字幕) 學生時期欺負我的老師叫傳播時偶然再次見面―。從那天開始就變成聽話的性處理寵物…。 森澤可奈
学生時代のセクハラ教師とデリヘルで偶然の再会―。その日から言いなり性処理ペットにさせられて…。 森沢かな
